|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = IC+;IP175E; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:18:02,00:1D:6A |oui = 00:18:02,00:1D:6A |bootwait = |stockbootloader = RedBoot;v2.3;; |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = default |defaultssid_regex = ^default$ |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-G19 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/16/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 658729080300 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000RV602E |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 108 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Alpha Networks WRG-G19 (8WRGG19..1C1G) The [[D-Link DIR-300 rev A1]] and [[Airlink101 AR335W]] are also WRG-G19s. According to the manual, the default SSID is '''default'''. The power adapter included with the device is a '''JENTEC''' AF1205-B (5V, 2.0A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Links of Interest== *[http://airlink101.com/download/download_links/m-ar430w.pdf Manual] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=23510 Airlink AR430w flashing instructions - DD-WRT Forums]
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300 DIR-300 on OpenWrt wiki] *[http://www.mylilsite.net/images/sdar430w.jpg Board shot] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24 rc5 :clone [[D-Link DIR-300 rev B1|dir-300]] :install like [[D-Link DIR-300 rev B1|dir-300]] :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=32594 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum] ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dir-300_b1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-300revb |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/report-devices-here-with-18-06-0-provided-image-too-big-to-save-overlay/18161/72?u=tmomas |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 18.06.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
